title: Request a Document via FOIA
description: A journalist is filing a Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) request for emails from the mayor's office.

tasks.description: Receive and log the FOIA request, noting the date and the specific records requested.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully logs the incoming request and assigns it a tracking number.

tasks.description: Acknowledge receipt of the request to the journalist and provide the legally mandated response timeline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a formal acknowledgement to the requestor.

tasks.description: Forward the request to the appropriate department (mayor's office) and the legal team to begin the document search and review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly routes the request to the responsible parties.
